content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hey, I am just working on my classwork. I am a college student who is also a full time working mom.
Woah, that sounds like a lot to juggle! How do you handle it all?
It can be difficult, but I have a great support system. My husband and I are both very involved in our children's lives, and we have a lot of help from family and friends.
That's great that you have so much support. I'm sure it makes a big difference.
It does. I don't know what I would do without them.
What are you studying in college?
I'm studying business administration.
Oh, that's cool. I'm going to school for writing.
I love writing! I wish I had more time to do it.
Me too! I'm actually hoping to be a journalist someday.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a sales associate at Sears.
Oh, that sounds interesting.
It's okay. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
I know what you mean. I'm not really passionate about my job either, but it's a good way to make money while I'm in school.
Exactly.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to read too, but I don't get to do it as much as I would like.
Me neither. I wish I had more time to read.
Maybe we can start a book club or something.
That would be fun! I'd be down for that.
